cn.releaseNotes: - Improved Video OCR tool with more precise detection and faster region/subtitle selection for scanning
cn.description:
MagicKit AI – 全能设备与实用工具包

MagicKit AI 是一款完整的实用工具应用，旨在帮助您监控设备状态、优化性能，并从一个便捷界面访问日常工具。专为 iOS 打造，MagicKit AI 集合了多种核心功能，同时保护您的隐私并节省电池。

设备与系统工具：
• 电池状态：查看当前电量和充电状态
• 存储使用情况：分析可用与已用空间
• 设备信息：查看基本硬件与系统详情
• 运行时间监控：了解设备持续运行时间
• 电池使用建议：获取实用省电技巧
• 照片清理：检测并删除重复或相似照片以释放空间

网络工具：
• 网速测试：测量您的互联网连接速度
• Wi-Fi 信息：查看网络名称、IP 地址和连接状态
• IP 查询：查看公网 IP 的地理位置

实用工具：
• 单位换算器：支持多种单位互转
• 货币转换器：实时汇率与换算
• 日期时间计算器：支持工作日差值计算
• 时区转换器：全球时间转换，含夏令时支持
• 倒计时与提醒：创建美观倒计时，可自定义提醒与重复事件
• Magic 计数器：多项目统计追踪，含连续天数与数据统计
• 二维码扫描：快速识别二维码
• 文档扫描：高质量扫描保存文档
• 指南针与水平仪：使用设备传感器测量方向与水平
• 屏幕方向锁定：在应用内锁定屏幕方向
• 音频检测仪：通过麦克风测量环境音量
• 剪贴板管理器：访问并管理当前会话复制内容
• 手电筒：开启设备手电筒
• 亮度调节：直接在应用内调整屏幕亮度

功能亮点：
• 简洁易用的向导式界面
• 无广告，无内购
• 轻量节能
• 兼容所有 iOS 设备
• 工具持续更新添加
• 注重隐私与性能设计

适用人群：
• 设备状态监控与性能优化
• 日常换算与测量任务
• 文档与二维码扫描
• 照片清理释放空间
• 倒计时提醒管理
• 习惯追踪与进度统计
• 快速工具访问（如手电筒、亮度）
• 简易网络诊断

立即下载 MagicKit AI，用一个智能强大的工具包简化您的日常任务！

advisories: 偶尔/轻微的卡通或幻想暴力
cn.description:
===铁皮公司正版授权===
===中国地区正式回归===

这是游戏创作者继获奖作品Kingdom Rush（王国保卫战）三部曲之后的又一超凡太空奇幻历险之作。即时，动态以及深度策略的游戏模式将带你穿越到不可思议的未知星球。沉浸式拟真游戏场景，过瘾的游戏玩法，以及超凡绝佳的艺术感和一丝诙谐幽默感带你进入激烈的战争世界。勇猛的士兵，威猛的机甲人和强大的外星人通通等你来统率，并肩迎接最强挑战。

招募和训练银河系中最伟大的英雄，率领他们参与几乎不可能完成的危险任务，发动他们强大的力量和能力。即使是在战斗最激烈的时候你也可通过改变自己部队的角色而进行战略调整，突击队员调整为狙击兵，火焰喷射器调整为导弹发射器。通过炸弹袭击，智能地雷，支援部队，砲塔和各种特种武器转变战斗态势。

机器人军队整装待发;星际战舰坠毁了;到处是巨大怪物，未知的种族;所向披靡的攻击;绝望的营救;无所畏惧地破坏行动正在银河之中发生......银河系需要你的统领。

银河系需要钢铁战队

***游戏特色***

-指导你的部队参加3个不同世界的21次任务。准备好发动英勇的攻击，坚守阵地，拯救平民，潜入超级计算机和各种英雄的物品。每个任务需要新的战术和行动才能取得胜利。

-通过17次终结式特别行动的战术规则测试你的机智。每个关卡通过伤痕铭记挑战。谅你也不敢。

-解锁不可能模式。仅对大无畏敢死队开放。谅你绝对不敢。

-在史诗战斗中击败巨大而非凡的头目。这些头目卑鄙而异常地巨大，他们决心要将你碾碎。钢铁战队，整装待发！

-40+升级以提升你的战略，同时授予你的部队防御无人机，凝固汽油弹火箭，反弹爆炸和更多的器械可使用。

-14位具有出色能力的英雄听从你的调遣。将他们训练到极致出色，否则惹恼他们后果自负。

-8种可向敌人发动进攻的特种武器，让你的战术更加具有深度。还有什么比得上一个瞄准了的导弹？对50枚高爆炸炸弹的轨道炮袭击！

-完成70+成就中的任何成就，赢得你应得的奖励。

选择你的游戏困难模式，找到属于你的公平挑战：休闲，普通或老兵，你自己决定！！

cn.releaseNotes:
- Introducing two Controls for watchOS: Bookmarks and Quick access. Open any webpage or the app with your Action Button or from the Control Center
- Ready for the new OS versions
- minor fixes
cn.description:
µBrowser is the micro browser for your Apple Watch.
µBrowser is the quick way to do some basic browsing on your Apple Watch when it is necessary. While it is limited it is good way to browse the web when you have no other device around.

Features:
- Open any URL (Entering a URL works especially good with the new Series 7 keyboard)
- Search the web with DuckDuckGo
- See your last visited pages
- Save pages from the history to your favorites
- iOS companion app to manage bookmarks
- Complications to quickly access the browser from the watch face

Please note:
µBrowser is a limited browsing experience. At first it is limited by the device size.
Then there are limitations regarding Javascript and large webpages. Login on pages will most likely not work. There is no back button (swiping still works) you need to start a new sessions.

advisories: 偶尔/轻微的卡通或幻想暴力
cn.description:
Zero One Progrise – 假面骑士01粉丝必备APP 同时支持苹果手表苹果手机单独运行。
走进令和第一位假面骑士的世界！Zero One Progrise 为粉丝提供全面的角色资料、骑士形态、驱动器介绍，以及有趣的问答挑战。
 核心功能
角色百科：飞电或人、不破谏、刃唯阿、天津垓、灭、迅……完整人物资料与关系图。
假面骑士图鉴：Zero-One、Vulcan、Valkyrie、Horobi、Jin 等，每个骑士的形态与必杀技介绍。
驱动器展示：收录 Hiden Zero-One Driver、AIMS Shotriser、Thousandriver 等驱动器，支持点击播放变身音效。
知识问答：考验你对剧中设定和剧情的熟悉度，答题通关还能解锁隐藏彩蛋！
沉浸体验：配合插画和音效，重温骑士变身的热血瞬间。

hk.releaseNotes: - Improved Video OCR tool with more precise detection and faster region/subtitle selection for scanning
hk.description:
MagicKit AI – 全方位裝置與工具箱

MagicKit AI 是一款完整的實用工具應用程式，專為 iOS 設計，幫助您監控裝置狀態、優化效能，並透過單一介面輕鬆使用日常工具。功能齊全，兼顧隱私與電池續航。

裝置與系統工具：
• 電池狀態：查看目前電量與充電情況
• 儲存空間使用：分析已用與可用空間
• 裝置資訊：查看基本硬體與系統資訊
• 開機時間追蹤：監控裝置開機持續時間
• 電池小貼士：提供實用省電建議
• 相片清理：偵測與刪除重複或相似相片釋放空間

網路工具：
• 網速測試：測量網路連線速度
• Wi-Fi 資訊：查看網路名稱、IP 位址與連線狀態
• IP 查詢：查看公網 IP 的地理位置資訊

實用工具：
• 單位換算器：支援各類單位轉換
• 貨幣換算器：即時匯率與幣值轉換
• 日期時間計算器：支援工作日計算的日期差異
• 時區轉換器：全球時間轉換，支援夏令時間顯示
• 倒數計時與提醒：建立美觀倒數計時，支援提醒與重複事件
• Magic 計數器：追蹤多個計數器，提供統計與連續天數
• QR 掃描器：快速掃描二維碼
• 文件掃描器：高品質掃描與儲存文件
• 指南針與水平儀：使用裝置感應器測量方向與水平
• 螢幕方向鎖定：於應用內鎖定螢幕方向
• 音量測量儀：透過麥克風測量環境音量
• 剪貼簿管理器：管理當前應用中的複製內容
• 手電筒：開啟裝置手電筒照明
• 螢幕亮度調整：可於應用內直接調整亮度

特色亮點：
• 簡潔直覺的導引式介面
• 無廣告、無內購
• 輕巧省電
• 支援所有 iOS 裝置
• 持續新增工具與更新
• 重視隱私與效能

適用族群：
• 裝置監控與效能優化
• 日常測量與轉換任務
• 掃描文件與 QR 碼
• 相片清理與空間管理
• 倒數提醒與計劃管理
• 追蹤習慣與統計進度
• 快速使用工具如手電筒與亮度調整
• 執行簡易網路測試診斷

立即下載 MagicKit AI，使用一款智慧又強大的工具箱，簡化您的日常工作與生活！

advisories: 偶爾/輕度的暴力卡通或幻想
hk.trackCensoredName: Kingdom Rush Frontiers 塔防生存戰爭
hk.trackName: Kingdom Rush Frontiers 塔防生存戰爭
hk.description:
全球最讓人欲罷不能的防禦遊戲歸來——歡迎來到《王國保衛戰：前線！》

空前盛大激烈的王國保衛戰：「前線」是全新的關卡，帶來迅猛刺激、扣人心弦的玩法，讓這款原創遊戲成為廣受歡迎的獲獎佳作。在這場史詩級的冒險（災難）中，可點擊你的部隊，配合最新的防禦塔、關卡、英雄和更多好東東，守衛異國大陸，抵禦飛龍、食人植物和地下世界恐怖族群的侵擾，把敵人統統殲滅。（別擔心，前作舊版的好東東，全都有保留。現在是經典復刻版。） 

《王國保衛戰：前線》內容豐富，像是全新升級的火炮讓你垂涎，像素畫面帶給你娛樂好享受！

遊戲特點 

· 鞏固異國大陸的前線——堅守沙漠、叢林還有地下世界的陣地 
· 8種特別防禦塔升級！用弩弓堡壘、聖殿騎士、死靈法師，還有地震機把敵人切開、燒焦并踩碎 - 嘿，這次真的很不一樣哦 
· 超過18種防禦塔技能！釋放死亡騎士、瘟疫雲或刺客，去竊取敵人寶藏，暗殺敵人！
· 超過40種具有特殊技能的敵人！隨時待命，對抗沙漠塵暴、部落薩滿、遊牧部落和地下恐怖生物 · 16位傳奇英雄。選擇你的戰士，訓練他們的技能！
· 每一關都有特別的部隊和特色！當心黑龍！
· 殘酷的頭目戰鬥！嘿！早就告訴你要升級啦…
· 超過70個成就，需要數小時去完成！
· 經典、鋼鐵和英雄模式挑戰你的戰術技能！
· 3種難度模式！準備好迎接真正的挑戰了嗎？開啟困難模式吧！悅耳的配樂、雄渾的配音，還有精緻美術，都能讓你沉浸！（还有卡通血液，效果逼真。）
· 遊戲内有百科全書！真正的勇士知己知彼…還對自己的防禦塔了如指掌。
學起來！

《王國保衛戰》廣受好評：IGN編輯推薦、Slide To Play必玩遊戲、148Apps編輯推薦、Jay is Games年度遊戲獎、Pocket Gamer金獎、Touch Arcade評分4.5/5、CNET最佳iPad遊戲"

Then there are limitations regarding Javascript and large webpages. Login on pages will most likely not work. There is no back button (swiping still works) you need to start a new sessions.

hk.description:
Zero One Progrise – 假面騎士01粉絲必備APP
走進令和第一位假面騎士的世界！Zero One Progrise 爲粉絲提供全面的角色資料、騎士形態、驅動器介紹，以及有趣的問答挑戰。
 核心功能
角色百科：飛電或人、不破諫、刃唯阿、天津垓、滅、迅……完整人物資料與關係圖。
假面騎士圖鑑：Zero-One、Vulcan、Valkyrie、Horobi、Jin 等，每個騎士的形態與必殺技介紹。
驅動器展示：收錄 Hiden Zero-One Driver、AIMS Shotriser、Thousandriver 等驅動器，支持點擊播放原創變身音效。
知識問答：考驗你對劇中設定和劇情的熟悉度，答題通關還能解鎖隱藏彩蛋！
沉浸體驗：配合插畫和音效，重溫騎士變身的熱血瞬間。

mo.trackName: ATracker PRO - 每日時間管理
mo.releaseNotes:
-- 修復歷史標籤中匯出功能的錯誤
-- 即時活動介面更改
-- 各種錯誤修復
mo.trackCensoredName: ATracker PRO - 每日時間管理
mo.description:
生命是寶貴的，你的時間也是如此。 ATracker幫助你記錄你的時間。

ATracker是一款時間記錄APP，非常易于使用，只需要很少的設定。它支援：一鍵啟動/停止時間記錄;條形圖或餅圖顯示您的時間去向;完全可定制的用戶界面;用標簽對任務進行分類;CSV和PDF資料匯出;在多個設備之間同步資料;通過Apple Watch，Widget和Siri開始/停止記錄。
這是一個全新的方式來組織你的一天。

范圍
ATracker是一種干凈簡約的追蹤方式：
 - 工作中的不同任務和專案
 - 學校研究和專案
 - 健身
 - 社交
 - 家庭作業
 - 嬰兒或兒童日常活動
 - 業余愛好專案
 - 或任何人們想要記錄和時間管理的活動

功能特色:
 - 只需輕按一下即可開始和停止記錄任務。
 - 今日的時間使用概覽。
 - 目標系統。
 - 完整的活動日志。專案歷史記錄。添加錯過或修改現有的時間記錄。
 - 自定義活動，有數百個圖標可供選擇。您還可以對任務設定顏色。
 - 柱狀圖和餅型圖報告。
 - 按標簽分組任務，并允許用戶按今日標簽上的標記過濾任務，以及在報告中顯示持續時間或次數。
 - 任務記時即使在設備關閉時仍然工作。
 - 任務定時. 鬧鈴即使在套用關閉狀態仍然會響
 - 手勢支援
 - 小部件
 -  Apple Watch支援
 -  Siri快捷方式
 - iPad支援Split View和Slide Over的多任務支援。
 - 使用PDF和CSV檔案匯出資料。
 - 能夠為每個任務條目記錄文本注釋。
 - 完全自定義具有更多外觀的UI，并允許用戶使用自己的圖片作為背景。

WEB訂閱
通過Web訂閱，ATracker支援跨多個設備進行同步。除App外，它還提供對ATracker服務的Web訪問。此附加組件是可選的。
在套用內購買的 ATracker 服務會依照您的套餐每月或每年續訂。套餐價格可能會因國家/地區而異。
 - 費用將在確認購買時向您的iTunes賬號收取
 - 您的訂閱會自動更新，除非您在已付費期間結束前至少24小時關閉自動更新
 -  您的賬號會在已付費期間結束前24小時內被再次收費
 -  您可以在購買后前往賬號設定管理訂閱并關閉自動更新
 -  您無法在已付費期間內取消購買
 - 如果您的試用還未結束，剩余的天數在您開始訂閱后會自動失效

APP支援
訪問https://support.wonderapps.se或通過support@wonderapps.se與我們聯系
服務條款：https://atracker.pro/atracker_TOS.html
隱私政策：https://atracker.pro/atracker_policy.html

mo.releaseNotes: - Improved Video OCR tool with more precise detection and faster region/subtitle selection for scanning
mo.description:
MagicKit AI – 全方位裝置與工具箱

MagicKit AI 是一款完整的實用工具應用程式，專為 iOS 設計，幫助您監控裝置狀態、優化效能，並透過單一介面輕鬆使用日常工具。功能齊全，兼顧隱私與電池續航。

裝置與系統工具：
• 電池狀態：查看目前電量與充電情況
• 儲存空間使用：分析已用與可用空間
• 裝置資訊：查看基本硬體與系統資訊
• 開機時間追蹤：監控裝置開機持續時間
• 電池小貼士：提供實用省電建議
• 相片清理：偵測與刪除重複或相似相片釋放空間

網路工具：
• 網速測試：測量網路連線速度
• Wi-Fi 資訊：查看網路名稱、IP 位址與連線狀態
• IP 查詢：查看公網 IP 的地理位置資訊

實用工具：
• 單位換算器：支援各類單位轉換
• 貨幣換算器：即時匯率與幣值轉換
• 日期時間計算器：支援工作日計算的日期差異
• 時區轉換器：全球時間轉換，支援夏令時間顯示
• 倒數計時與提醒：建立美觀倒數計時，支援提醒與重複事件
• Magic 計數器：追蹤多個計數器，提供統計與連續天數
• QR 掃描器：快速掃描二維碼
• 文件掃描器：高品質掃描與儲存文件
• 指南針與水平儀：使用裝置感應器測量方向與水平
• 螢幕方向鎖定：於應用內鎖定螢幕方向
• 音量測量儀：透過麥克風測量環境音量
• 剪貼簿管理器：管理當前應用中的複製內容
• 手電筒：開啟裝置手電筒照明
• 螢幕亮度調整：可於應用內直接調整亮度

特色亮點：
• 簡潔直覺的導引式介面
• 無廣告、無內購
• 輕巧省電
• 支援所有 iOS 裝置
• 持續新增工具與更新
• 重視隱私與效能

適用族群：
• 裝置監控與效能優化
• 日常測量與轉換任務
• 掃描文件與 QR 碼
• 相片清理與空間管理
• 倒數提醒與計劃管理
• 追蹤習慣與統計進度
• 快速使用工具如手電筒與亮度調整
• 執行簡易網路測試診斷

立即下載 MagicKit AI，使用一款智慧又強大的工具箱，簡化您的日常工作與生活！

mo.releaseNotes:
- Introducing two Controls for watchOS: Bookmarks and Quick access. Open any webpage or the app with your Action Button or from the Control Center
- Ready for the new OS versions
- minor fixes
mo.description:
µBrowser is the micro browser for your Apple Watch.
µBrowser is the quick way to do some basic browsing on your Apple Watch when it is necessary. While it is limited it is good way to browse the web when you have no other device around.

Features:
- Open any URL (Entering a URL works especially good with the new Series 7 keyboard)
- Search the web with DuckDuckGo
- See your last visited pages
- Save pages from the history to your favorites
- iOS companion app to manage bookmarks
- Complications to quickly access the browser from the watch face

Please note:
µBrowser is a limited browsing experience. At first it is limited by the device size.
Then there are limitations regarding Javascript and large webpages. Login on pages will most likely not work. There is no back button (swiping still works) you need to start a new sessions.

advisories: 偶爾/輕度的暴力卡通或幻想
mo.description:
Zero One Progrise – 假面騎士01粉絲必備APP
走進令和第一位假面騎士的世界！Zero One Progrise 爲粉絲提供全面的角色資料、騎士形態、驅動器介紹，以及有趣的問答挑戰。
 核心功能
角色百科：飛電或人、不破諫、刃唯阿、天津垓、滅、迅……完整人物資料與關係圖。
假面騎士圖鑑：Zero-One、Vulcan、Valkyrie、Horobi、Jin 等，每個騎士的形態與必殺技介紹。
驅動器展示：收錄 Hiden Zero-One Driver、AIMS Shotriser、Thousandriver 等驅動器，支持點擊播放原創變身音效。
知識問答：考驗你對劇中設定和劇情的熟悉度，答題通關還能解鎖隱藏彩蛋！
沉浸體驗：配合插畫和音效，重溫騎士變身的熱血瞬間。

tw.trackName: 照片橡皮擦 - 去除水印雜物多余人物
tw.description:
妳還在為照片上不請自來的過客犯愁嗎？
使用照片橡皮擦，有瑕疵的照片瞬間修復，變成完美收藏。
照片橡皮擦可以輕松幫妳去除圖片上的電線、人物、圖標、水印、文字等等雜物，就和拍照壹樣簡單。
照片橡皮擦使用智能算法自動填補受損和缺失的區域，智能填充來到了妳的手機，P圖再也不需要壹臺電腦。
特點：
- 刪除多余的人物
- 擦除照片上的電線
- 擦除臉上的粉刺，黑痣
- 修復有劃痕的舊照片
- 去除照片上意外的移動物體
- 去除照片上的水印、日期等等等等
- 簡單易用

什麽，還有不能完成的其他P圖任務，看看我們的其他軟件，總有壹款能幫到妳：
• 輕松摳圖 - 史上最強摳圖神器.
• 色彩大師 - 改變照片顏色,黑白多彩特效.
• 美圖聚焦 - 虛化背景, 模糊背景, 美化照片, 突出運動健美的妳.
• 奇幻變臉秀 - 制作變臉動畫，照片變視頻，GIF圖片.

給我們壹個評論，幫助我們提高app的功能！

Subscription:
• Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
• Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
• Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
• Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable
- Privacy Policy: http://ptuwang.com/conf/privacy_notice_cutout.pdf
- Terms of Use: http://ptuwang.com/conf/term_gen.pdf
tw.trackCensoredName: 照片橡皮擦 - 去除水印雜物多余人物

tw.releaseNotes:
- Introducing Color Palettes: discover a collection of beautifully curated color schemes to elevate your designs. Simply choose a palette, and watch as the objects on your canvas are seamlessly transformed with its stunning colors
- Tons of bug fixes

If you enjoy using our logo maker app, please write a positive review because without your support we don't exist!
tw.description:
在iPhone、iPad或iPod Touch用InstaLogo設計新logo，全新設計並支援Apple Watch，隨時隨地製作漂亮的logo和設計。

*****

InstaLogo可將你的iOS裝置變成logo設計工具，數分鐘即可設計出logo、傳單、邀請函等等。然後可透過郵件、上傳到Dropbox、Evernote及Box與朋友和同事分享，也可儲存到iOS裝置或傳送列印。一切從未如此簡單。

下面是我們的一些客戶對InstaLogo的評價:

「非常好用，下載時沒想到有這麼好用，現在簡直愛不釋手」 - Benjtee

「絕對值得收藏，以前付了很多錢請設計師，早發現這款應用就好了.... 」 - christofim

「這是我發現的最好用的logo設計App，5星好評！！」 - Dragoman7

「非常不錯的一款App，簡單、好玩、實用！幹的不錯！」 - IrocOn1

*****

這款App Store上最受歡迎的logo設計app讓你可以:

建立漂亮的Logo
-	海量logo庫可選
-	從照片庫匯入照片
-	可選大量字型，或匯入自己的字型
-	複製並粘貼文字、圖片等到應用內
-	縮放、拖動及旋轉你的logo元素來調整大小和視角

調整和修改現有Logo
-	更改logo的漸變和色彩、文字及背景
-	新增專業級陰影
-	使用格線完美對齊
-	按度數精確調整元素角度

修復錯誤
-	復原和重做每一步
-	輕鬆刪除logo任一部分或全刪
-	使用套索工具來回移動物件

盡情發揮創造力
-	用手指或手寫筆繪畫，現在還支援3D Touch
-	從Apple Watch上的新調色板應用選取顏色
-	支援iPad Pro和Apple Pencil，讓你的創造力盡情揮灑

分享和儲存Logo
-	透明背景儲存，非常適合日常使用
-	上傳圖片到Dropbox、Evernote及Box，安全並可分享
-	透過郵件分享logo或直接上傳到Facebook

*****

功能列表

-	可在iPhone、iPad及iPod touch上使用
-	支援iPad Pro、Apple Pencil及Apple Watch
-	iPad Air 2及更高版本支援多工
-	iPhone 6s、6s Plus、7及7 Plus支援3D Touch
-	支援橫向和縱向
-	超過50,000個logo組合
-	超過270個手選拉丁和非拉丁字型 
-	從照片庫匯入自己的圖片
-	移動、調整大小、旋轉、翻轉及微移物件
-	用圖片填充文字和logo
-	為文字新增自訂邊框
-	調整文字間距和弧度
-	專業RGB/HSB/Hex拾色器
-	收藏調色板
-	畫布和照片裁剪
-	調整每個物件的不透明度
-	智慧輔助線
-	專業陰影編輯器
-	完整復原和重做
-	支援手指和手寫筆
-	橡皮工具
-	套索工具
-	支援透明PNG
-	支援AirPrint
-	使用Google Drive、Box、Dropbox及Evernote分享
-	透過郵件和Facebook分享
-	支援29種語言

*****
部分功能需要應用內購買。

訂閱價格及條款

- 免費試用訂閱是自動續訂的，除非在續訂之前24小時取消。                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
- 免費試用期(如有提供)任何未使用的部分將在使用者購買訂閱後作廢(如適用)。
- 使用者可以管理訂閱，購買後轉到使用者的帳戶設定可關閉自動續訂，訂閱期任何未使用部分將不提供退款。
- 在使用者確認購買後，付款將從使用者的iTunes帳戶收取。
- 將在當前訂閱期結束前24小時內確認續訂費用並從帳戶收取。
- 這些價格是針對美國客戶的。在其他國家的定價可能會有所不同，實際費用會換算成你所在國家的貨幣。

可以在這裡閱讀使用條款和隱私權政策:
http://instalogocreator.com/terms
http://instalogocreator.com/privacy

獲取24/7支援
如有問題、意見及支援請求，請傳送郵件至support@instalogocreator.com。

馬上下載InstaLogo Logo建立器！

tw.description:
µBrowser is the micro browser for your Apple Watch.
µBrowser is the quick way to do some basic browsing on your Apple Watch when it is necessary. While it is limited it is good way to browse the web when you have no other device around.

Features:
- Open any URL (Entering a URL works especially good with the new Series 7 keyboard)
- Search the web with DuckDuckGo
- See your last visited pages
- Save pages from the history to your favorites
- iOS companion app to manage bookmarks
- Complications to quickly access the browser from the watch face

Please note:
µBrowser is a limited browsing experience. At first it is limited by the device size.
Then there are limitations regarding Javascript and large webpages. Login on pages will most likely not work. There is no back button (swiping still works) you need to start a new sessions.

us.releaseNotes: - Improved Video OCR tool with more precise detection and faster region/subtitle selection for scanning
us.description:
MagicKit AI is a complete utility app designed to help you monitor your device, optimize performance, and access everyday tools from one convenient interface. Built specifically for iOS, MagicKit AI brings together essential features while maintaining your privacy and battery life.

Device and System Tools
• Battery Status: View current charge level and charging state
• Storage Usage: Analyze available and used storage
• Device Info: Check basic hardware and system details
• Uptime Tracker: Monitor how long your device has been running
• Battery Tips: Get practical advice to improve battery usage
• Photo Cleaner: Detect and remove duplicate or similar photos to free up space
• Contact Cleaner: Organize contacts by finding duplicates and incomplete entries
• RAM Manager: Monitor memory usage and optimize performance
• Device Benchmark: Test CPU, GPU, memory, and network performance

Network Tools
• Speed Test: Measure internet connection speed
• Wi-Fi Info: See network name, IP address, and connection status
• IP Lookup: Check geolocation of public IP addresses
• Location Info: Track GPS location, speed, direction, and altitude

Security & Privacy Tools
• Password Generator: Create strong, secure passwords with customizable options
• Passphrase Generator: Generate memorable and secure passphrases
• UUID Generator: Create unique identifiers in various formats
• Secure PIN Generator: Generate secure PIN codes with multiple options
• Temporary Email: Create disposable email addresses for privacy protection

Utility Tools
• Unit Converter: Convert between different measurements
• Currency & Crypto Converter: Get live exchange rates for fiat and cryptocurrencies
• Date Time Calculator: Calculate differences between dates with business days support
• Time Zone Converter: Convert time across various time zones with live updates and DST status
• Countdown & Reminders: Create beautiful countdowns with customizable reminders and recurring events
• Magic Counter: Track multiple counters with detailed statistics and streaks
• QR Scanner: Scan QR codes instantly
• Document & Card Scanner: Capture and save high-quality document scans with AI-powered text recognition
• Compass and Level: Measure direction and level using device sensors
• Orientation Lock: Lock screen orientation while using the app
• Audio Meter: Measure surrounding sound levels using the microphone
• Clipboard Manager: Access and manage copied text within the app session
• Flashlight & Brightness: Turn on the device flashlight and adjust screen brightness
• Note Taker: Create, organize, and manage notes with categories and iCloud backup
• Universal Generator: Generate random data including text, numbers, dates, and more
• Color Palettes Studio: Create, extract, and manage beautiful color palettes from images or manually using color pickers — perfect for designers and creatives

Highlights
• Clean and user-friendly interface with new wizard-based tools
• Featured Tools section showcasing the most popular utilities
• No ads or in-app purchases
• Lightweight and battery-efficient
• Compatible with all iOS devices
• Frequent updates with new tools
• Built with privacy and performance in mind
• Dark/Light theme support with smooth animations

Perfect for
• Device monitoring and optimization
• Everyday measurement and conversion tasks
• Scanning documents and QR codes
• Cleaning up photo storage and contacts
• Creating and managing countdowns with reminders
• Tracking habits and progress with multiple counters
• Accessing quick tools like flashlight and brightness control
• Performing simple network diagnostics
• Generating secure passwords and managing privacy
• Taking quick notes and organizing information
• Designing and managing color palettes for creative projects

Download MagicKit AI today and simplify your daily tasks with one smart, powerful toolkit.

us.trackName: 生辰 — 桌面时间小组件
us.releaseNotes:
- 适配 iOS 26

us.description:
这是一款关于生、死、心愿与延续的App。

小时候，我以为自己是不会老去的彼得·潘，却终究敌不过健康磨损，容颜老去。
时针转动，生命流逝，但每一次心跳都可以更加有力。

有时候，生命只是一连串的数字，多少年，多少月，多少小时，多少分钟。当你意识到这个时，往往陷入巨大的虚无感之中，惶恐不能自拔。
而现在，这些数字可以成为你重塑生命的坐标，指引你走向更健康、更长久的未来。

生辰 2.0 通过 AI 分析和科学判断，不仅预测生命的终点，更为你铺就延长生命的道路：

- 探索你的生命时钟：了解当下的预期寿命，直面生命的有限与珍贵。
- 发现延寿的可能：看见改变健康习惯能为你带来多少额外的生命时光。
- 聚合健康数据：自动追踪睡眠、锻炼、压力（HRV）、经期、喝水等十余种健康数据

美国诗人纳·斯待尔在87岁那年写道：
"如果我能够从头活过，我会试着犯更多的错。
我会放松一点，我会灵活一点。
我会爬更多的山，游更多的河，看更多的日落。"

因为了解生命的终点，才能更好地珍惜当下的每一刻。生辰2.0 探索健康的可能，让我们成为你健康旅程的长久伙伴。

【生辰 App 会员服务说明】

1.会员包含几种订购类型
订阅周期：1个月、3个月、12个月
2.首次订购后会通过iTunes账户直接支付；账户会在到期前24小时内扣费，扣费成功后自动顺延一个订阅周期
3.本服务由您自主选择是否续订，如需取消，请在订阅到期24小时前，在 AppleID 设置中取消
4.生辰App 会员协议
生辰App 会员服务协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-payment/
5.生辰App 软件协议与隐私政策
生辰 软件许可及服务协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-agreement/
生辰 隐私协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-privacy/
us.trackCensoredName: 生辰 — 桌面时间小组件

us.releaseNotes:
Technical improvements! 

Get ready for the Anniversary Update! 

Coming this November — celebrating the game’s 6th Anniversary!
us.description:
You are reading this text.
 But why?
 Are you looking for a game,
 or has the game found you?
 Religion Inc. is more than just a strategy game.
 It is a simulation of creating a new reality.
 Will you shape faith,
 or will faith shape you?
 Humanity has always sought light in the darkness.
 It has always longed to believe in something greater,
 something that gives meaning to existence.
 That’s how religions were born –
 as beacons in the storms of history,
 as compasses in the ocean of life.
 What if you become the creator of a religion?
 What if you could build your own faith, your own truth, your own reality?
You are the Creator.
 You are the source.
 You are the inspiration.
 And if you are reading this text – you’re already in the game!
 All that’s left is to install – and enjoy the process, the simulation of creating religions!

 Become the source of faith – in the strategy simulator Religion Inc.

 Humanity has always felt the need to believe in something greater than itself. Throughout history, people have searched for a light that could guide them through the darkness of the ages. For millions, that light became faith. Religion became a beacon, helping many find meaning in this world, weather the storms of change, and discover a path to happiness.

 There are many religions in the world, each shaped by its time and its challenges. But how else could this process have developed? What other fascinating and diverse forms could human beliefs have taken? The answers await you in our new game! Create your own unique religion, test its strength through the trials of time, and see if it can lead humanity to unity.

Game Features
*A variety of religious archetypes with unique cultural values and traditions!
*Unlock all archetypes through gameplay: monotheism, spiritualism, pantheon, shamanism, paganism, and many more!
*Will your followers become devoted fanatics or achieve higher enlightenment? The choice is yours!
*Hundreds of real-world religious aspects – and even more to come! Learn more about world religions!
*Unique active abilities for each archetype – perform miracles and change the world!
*Relaxing gameplay, perfect for an evening break: collect faith points with simple clicks and explore various religious aspects. Play at your own pace and enjoy!

Create your own unique religion by combining different religious aspects in the strategic simulator – Religion Inc.

Peace and love to all, brothers and sisters!

us.description:
RadarScope is an AMS-award-winning weather visualization tool that empowers meteorologists, public safety officials, storm spotters, and weather enthusiasts to view a full suite of single-site radar data and related severe weather products. Your initial purchase provides professional radar visualization in a fully native app, free from distracting and invasive practices, with optional subscription packages to add even more capabilities.

Whether you’re scanning for a mesocyclone’s tell-tale hook echo, pinpointing the landfall of a hurricane’s eye wall, or identifying velocity couplet, hail spike, or debris ball signatures, RadarScope displays native radar data in its original radial format. You see what the radar sees almost as soon as the radar sees it, with automatic updates every two to ten minutes depending on the radar’s scanning strategy.

Your initial app purchase includes the following:

• Full suite of single-site radar products for the US, Canada, Guam, Denmark, Finland, and Germany
• 6-frame radar loops
• Two built-in providers for radar data
• Tornado, thunderstorm, flash flood, special marine, snow squall, and extreme wind warnings in the US
• Selected severe weather warnings in Canada and Australia
• NWS-generated storm tracks with hail, TVS, and mesocyclone attributes
• Inspector and distance tools
• Color palette options for radar data
• AllisonHouse data plan integration
• Spotter Network integration for storm and location reporting
• mPING integration for submitting weather reports to NSSL
• Bundled maps with political boundaries, water bodies, and major highways, optimized for low-bandwidth use
• Support for widgets and complications
• Universal app for Apple platforms, including Apple Watch and Apple TV
• Family Sharing support

RadarScope Pro Tier One is an optional annual subscription that adds more features for tracking severe weather:

• 30-frame radar loops
• Cloud-to-ground lightning strikes
• Severe weather watches in the US and Canada
• Special weather statements in the US and Canada
• Mesoscale convective and precipitation discussions
• SPC convective, tornado, hail, wind, and fire outlooks
• WPC excessive rainfall outlooks in the US
• Local storm reports in the US
• Custom color palette support
• Multi-pane display (2 on phones; 4 on larger devices)
• Family Sharing support

RadarScope Pro Tier Two is an optional annual or monthly subscription that transforms RadarScope into a more complete visualization tool for a larger suite of weather products, including:

• Everything in Pro Tier One
• 50-frame radar loops
• A third provider for US radar data
• NEXRAD Level II radar data for the US with a 30-year historical archive
• Historical NEXRAD Level III, super-res, and non-US radar data with a 30-day archive
• Historical NWS bulletins with a 19-year archive
• GOES East and GOES West satellite products
• NSSL’s Multi-Radar Multi-Sensor (MRMS) products
• NCEP’s Real-Time Mesoscale Assimilation (RTMA) products
• Surface observations
• Atmospheric soundings in the US
• Hail size, hail probability, and azimuthal shear contours with a 30-day archive
• More detailed transportation and satellite imagery maps
• Custom color palette support for GOES, MRMS, and RTMA
• Server-sent events for radar and warning updates
• Cross-platform subscription sharing on up to 5 devices
• Family sharing support

If you choose to buy a RadarScope Pro subscription, it will be charged to your App Store account. The subscription will be auto-renewed within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period at the same price you originally paid. Subscriptions may be managed and auto-renewal disabled via your App Store account settings after the purchase. Once purchased, the subscription cannot be canceled during the active subscription period.

DTN is committed to safeguarding your privacy online. Our privacy policy is available for review at https://www.dtn.com/privacy-policy/

Please visit our web site for more information.

us.description:
MoneyTrack - Smart Personal Finance Tracker
Record every dollar, take control of your finances. A clutter-free budgeting app with zero ads, zero splash screens, and zero financial product promotions.

■ KEY FEATURES
• Auto-Tracking: Seamlessly integrates with Shortcuts for automatic expense capture triggered by your transactions
• Versatile Entries: Track income, expenses, reimbursements, transfers, credit card payments, installments, and debt management
• Powerful Analytics: Visualize spending patterns through pie charts, bar graphs and trend lines to quickly spot financial issues
• Smart Budgeting: Create annual/monthly budgets for total spending and categories with dynamic daily allowance adjustments

■ COMPREHENSIVE ASSET MANAGEMENT
• Unified dashboard for all account types (cash, checking accounts, credit cards, store cards)
• Balance sheet and net worth tracking for real-time financial status monitoring
• Credit card management system (payment alerts, limit tracking, grace period calculation)
• Multi-currency support with exchange rates for all major world currencies

■ SMART FEATURES
• Multiple Books: Easily separate personal, business, and project finances
• Collaborative Tracking: Invite family members to create transparent household finances
• Cloud Sync: Free data backup across devices with secure protection
• Easy Import/Export: Support for importing from banking apps and exporting to Excel
• Recurring Transactions: Set up automatic entries that generate on schedule
• Payment Plans: Track installment payments with due date reminders
• Custom Categories: Create unlimited category levels to match your financial organization

■ MULTI-DEVICE EXPERIENCE
Sync between iPhone, iPad and PC with instant updates, keeping your financial picture complete no matter where you are.

■ FOCUSED ON FINANCIAL WELLNESS
We're dedicated to one mission — helping you achieve financial clarity. No investment pitches, no social distractions, just a clean and effective expense tracking experience.

Zero One Progrise brings you a complete fan-made encyclopedia of characters, Riders, Drivers, and fun quizzes.
Features
Character Encyclopedia: Learn about Aruto Hiden, Isamu Fuwa, Yua Yaiba, Gai Amatsu, Horobi, Jin, and more.
Rider Gallery: Explore Zero-One, Vulcan, Valkyrie, Thouser, Horobi, Jin, and their different forms.
Driver Showcase: Discover the Hiden Zero-One Driver, AIMS Shotriser, Thousandriver, and more – tap to play original transform sounds.
Quiz Challenge: Test your knowledge of characters, forms, and story details with fun trivia games.
Immersive Experience: Relive the excitement with custom artwork and sound effects.
Disclaimer: This is an unofficial fan app.

tr.releaseNotes: - Improved Video OCR tool with more precise detection and faster region/subtitle selection for scanning
tr.description:
MagicKit AI is a complete utility app designed to help you monitor your device, optimize performance, and access everyday tools from one convenient interface. Built specifically for iOS, MagicKit AI brings together essential features while maintaining your privacy and battery life.

Device and System Tools
• Battery Status: View current charge level and charging state
• Storage Usage: Analyze available and used storage
• Device Info: Check basic hardware and system details
• Uptime Tracker: Monitor how long your device has been running
• Battery Tips: Get practical advice to improve battery usage
• Photo Cleaner: Detect and remove duplicate or similar photos to free up space
• Contact Cleaner: Organize contacts by finding duplicates and incomplete entries
• RAM Manager: Monitor memory usage and optimize performance
• Device Benchmark: Test CPU, GPU, memory, and network performance

Network Tools
• Speed Test: Measure internet connection speed
• Wi-Fi Info: See network name, IP address, and connection status
• IP Lookup: Check geolocation of public IP addresses
• Location Info: Track GPS location, speed, direction, and altitude

Security & Privacy Tools
• Password Generator: Create strong, secure passwords with customizable options
• Passphrase Generator: Generate memorable and secure passphrases
• UUID Generator: Create unique identifiers in various formats
• Secure PIN Generator: Generate secure PIN codes with multiple options
• Temporary Email: Create disposable email addresses for privacy protection

Utility Tools
• Unit Converter: Convert between different measurements
• Currency & Crypto Converter: Get live exchange rates for fiat and cryptocurrencies
• Date Time Calculator: Calculate differences between dates with business days support
• Time Zone Converter: Convert time across various time zones with live updates and DST status
• Countdown & Reminders: Create beautiful countdowns with customizable reminders and recurring events
• Magic Counter: Track multiple counters with detailed statistics and streaks
• QR Scanner: Scan QR codes instantly
• Document & Card Scanner: Capture and save high-quality document scans with AI-powered text recognition
• Compass and Level: Measure direction and level using device sensors
• Orientation Lock: Lock screen orientation while using the app
• Audio Meter: Measure surrounding sound levels using the microphone
• Clipboard Manager: Access and manage copied text within the app session
• Flashlight & Brightness: Turn on the device flashlight and adjust screen brightness
• Note Taker: Create, organize, and manage notes with categories and iCloud backup
• Universal Generator: Generate random data including text, numbers, dates, and more
• Color Palettes Studio: Create, extract, and manage beautiful color palettes from images or manually using color pickers — perfect for designers and creatives

Highlights
• Clean and user-friendly interface with new wizard-based tools
• Featured Tools section showcasing the most popular utilities
• No ads or in-app purchases
• Lightweight and battery-efficient
• Compatible with all iOS devices
• Frequent updates with new tools
• Built with privacy and performance in mind
• Dark/Light theme support with smooth animations

Perfect for
• Device monitoring and optimization
• Everyday measurement and conversion tasks
• Scanning documents and QR codes
• Cleaning up photo storage and contacts
• Creating and managing countdowns with reminders
• Tracking habits and progress with multiple counters
• Accessing quick tools like flashlight and brightness control
• Performing simple network diagnostics
• Generating secure passwords and managing privacy
• Taking quick notes and organizing information
• Designing and managing color palettes for creative projects

Download MagicKit AI today and simplify your daily tasks with one smart, powerful toolkit.

tr.releaseNotes:
- Introducing two Controls for watchOS: Bookmarks and Quick access. Open any webpage or the app with your Action Button or from the Control Center
- Ready for the new OS versions
- minor fixes
tr.description:
µBrowser is the micro browser for your Apple Watch.
µBrowser is the quick way to do some basic browsing on your Apple Watch when it is necessary. While it is limited it is good way to browse the web when you have no other device around.

Features:
- Open any URL (Entering a URL works especially good with the new Series 7 keyboard)
- Search the web with DuckDuckGo
- See your last visited pages
- Save pages from the history to your favorites
- iOS companion app to manage bookmarks
- Complications to quickly access the browser from the watch face

Please note:
µBrowser is a limited browsing experience. At first it is limited by the device size.
Then there are limitations regarding Javascript and large webpages. Login on pages will most likely not work. There is no back button (swiping still works) you need to start a new sessions.

Kingdom Rush Frontiers is a whole new level of the furiously fast, enchantingly charming gameplay that made kingdom Rush an award-winning Tower Defense hit.
Defend exotic lands from dragons, man-eating plants, and ghastly denizens of the underworld -all with flashy towers, levels, heroes, and more goodies to help you crush your enemies to a pulp.

BUILD MIGHTY TOWERS!
• OVER 18 TOWER ABILITIES! Unleash Death Riders, pestilence clouds, or assassins that steal and kill your enemies!
• 8 SPECIALIZED TOWER UPGRADES! Slice, sizzle, and stomp your foes with Crossbow Forts, Mighty Templars, Necromancers, and even Earthquake Machines - hey, we told you we were shaking things up.
• UPGRADE SYSTEM allows you to min/max your towers towards your preferred strategy.
• Fortify the frontier in exotic new lands - hold the line in deserts, jungles, and even the underworld!

TRAIN LEGENDARY HEROES
• 16 LEGENDARY HEROES. Choose among mighty champions and train their abilities! Each has unique specialties that fit different play styles and strategies!
• Special units and features on every stage! Watch out for the Black Dragon!

DEFEAT THEM ALL
• OVER 40 ENEMIES with unique abilities! Stay on your toes as you fight through desert sandworms, tribal shamans, nomad tribes, and underground terrors. Action like you have never seen before!
• MERCILESS BOSS FIGHTS! Hey, we told you to get those upgrades...

MORE MIND-BOGGLING CONTENT
• Hours of gameplay with OVER 80 ACHIEVEMENTS! what can you expect from Ironhide Games, the creators of Kingdom rush? You will be hooked for hours searching for Easter eggs and achievements!
• IN-GAME ENCYCLOPEDIA! learn all about your enemies and you will be able to plan the best strategy to defeat them. Study up!
• CLASSIC, IRON, AND HEROIC GAME MODES to challenge your tactical skills!
• 3 DIFFICULTY MODES! Are you up for a real challenge? Go with Hard mode!
• PLAY IT OFFLINE! No internet? No problem! You will be able to jump into real action even offline!

-----------------------------------------------------

PRAISE FOR KINGDOM RUSH: IGN Editor's Choice, Slide To Play Must Have, 148 Apps Editor's Choice, Jay is Games Game of the Year, Pocket Gamer Gold Award, Touch Arcade 4.5/5

Terms and Conditions:
https://www.ironhidegames.com/TermsOfService

Privacy Policy:
https://www.ironhidegames.com/PrivacyPolicy

Video creators, podcast creators, and streamers:
We would love to see your content on Youtube and Twitch! We support and promote channel creators so, if you want us to showcase your videos or want to know more about our games, feel free to write to us to contact@ironhidegames.com

tr.releaseNotes:
Greetings, Property Tycoons!


We have been busy eliminating bugs, enriching features and providing you with investment opportunities!
And we’ve got a new limited-time event running in MONOPOLY!


Log in and check it out today!
tr.description:
Play MONOPOLY on the go without distractions – no ads, no fuss! 

Challenge friends, family and fans from around the globe in the digital version of the official MONOPOLY board game, licensed by Hasbro. 

Head online to play your favourite board game with anyone, anywhere, at any time, or compete against state-of-the-art AI opponents offline. Plus, with the seamless PASS & PLAY mode, you can play the classic MONOPOLY board game with your friends with just one device! 

The classic MONOPOLY board game takes a bold leap into a new format, arriving on mobile with amazing graphics, smooth animations and a catchy soundtrack! 


HOW TO PLAY MONOPOLY

1. Download the official MONOPOLY app
2. Press “PLAY”
3. Pick a mode, board, dice and token
4. Roll the dice and move around the board
5. If you land on a property tile, you can buy it
6. Collect rent when other players land on it
7. Continue around the board, drawing cards when instructed – will you be hit with a surprise tax? Sent to jail? Or get a little bonus money? 
8. If you run out of money, you’ll be bankrupt and out of the game
9. The last player left with a profit wins! 

FEATURES

- MONOPOLY ON THE GO – No connection? No problem. Our roster of AI opponents are ready to challenge you! Or play with your friends offline with Pass & Play! 
- MULTIPLE MODES – Take on AI opponents in Single Player or compete against friends and family in Pass & Play or Online With Friends. Try out Online Multiplayer and face off against fellow tycoons from around the world! 
- EXCLUSIVE BOARDS – Experience the iconic board game like never before with exclusive boards and more! 
- AWESOME NEW TOKENS AND DICE – Whatever your style, MONOPOLY has a set of dice fit for a future tycoon! Pick from nostalgic classic tokens or brand-new designs exclusive to the mobile game.

Get the most authentic MONOPOLY experience with the official MONOPOLY mobile game!

The MONOPOLY name and logo, the distinctive design of the gameboard, the four corner squares, the MR. MONOPOLY name and character, as well as each of the distinctive elements of the board and playing pieces are trademarks of Hasbro for its property trading game and game equipment. © 1935, 2025 Hasbro. All Rights Reserved.

Zero One Progrise brings you a complete fan-made encyclopedia of characters, Riders, Drivers, and fun quizzes.
